entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Bathurst
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:54 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Heavy Snow, -8.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bathurst Airport 2:56 PM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Heavy Snow
Temperature: -8.1°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -9.3°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow ending this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Clearing overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 16 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 16 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
